lines.text: [In a TV interview]
Agent Browning, can you shed some light on what's been happening here?

Well, it looks like some goddamn stupid motherfucker has decided to take some poor innocent fucks hostage. Now we've been out here all fucking night trying to deal with this goddamn situation, but there hasn't been a fucking break yet. But we're sure as shit hopeful that everyone will be safe, and that we bring this motherfucker, or motherfuckers, as the case may be, to fucking justice. How's that?

[mocking his tip]
Oh, you are a big spender. I like that in a man.
Now I just don't know what it's gonna take to make you shut up.
If you don't bite, then don't bark, doggie dog.
Hey, you want to make us some coffee?
Do I look like your bitch?

[on Milo]
Excuse me... but you're friend... is awake.
Where are you going?
I don't wanna be part of this. I'm turning myself in.

[pointing a gun]
Don't make me do it!
Albo gator... sacrifice for a gain.

[coughing on cigarette given by Law]
Goddammit! Menthol... I hate menthol.
I know.
Can I get my coat? I'm cold.
Alright, kid.
[first lines]
Why do I always get the shit-end of these assignment? I'd like to ask that question.

[chuckles]
What the hell were you expecting, Bobby, Waco?

[to Law]
Jesus, I didn't know you could say that many words in a row.
Okay, plan. I'm listening...
Tell them you will let go of the hostages one-by-one. Then, instead of releasing us, release yourself.

[slow realization]
Yeah. We, uh, pretend *we're* the hostages.
And then... tie us up. And, uh... be gone before they come in.
What do you think?
Hey, I'm a sociopath, you know what I think.
[props up his rifle]
